getInterface

() Object

Defined in src/provider.js:151

Get an interface to expose externally representing this port. Providers are registered with the port using either provideSynchronous or provideAsynchronous depending on the desired return interface.

Returns:

Object:

The external interface of this Provider.

  • identifier
  • args
)
Function

Defined in src/provider.js:258

Get a new instance of the registered provider.

Parameters:

  • source String

    The port this instance is interactign with.

  • identifier String

    the messagable address for this provider.

  • args Array

    Constructor arguments for the provider.

Returns:

Function:

A function to send messages to the provider.

()

on

(
  • type
  • handler
)

Inherited from handleEvents: src/util.js:194

Register a method to be executed when an event of a specific type occurs.

Parameters:

  • type String | Function
    The type of event to register against.
  • handler Function
    The handler to run when the event occurs.

once

(
  • type
  • handler
)

Inherited from handleEvents: src/util.js:202

Register a method to be execute the next time an event occurs.

Parameters:

  • type String | Function
    The type of event to wait for.
  • handler Function
    The handler to run the next time a matching event is raised.

(
  • list
  • predicate
)
Array

Inherited from handleEvents but overwritten in src/util.js:154

Filter a list based on a predicate. The list is filtered in place, with selected items removed and returned by the function.

Parameters:

  • list Array
    The list to filter
  • predicate Function
    The method to run on each item.

Returns:

Array: Selected items
